title: Adaptive Gamification Language Learning Design for Medical, Legal, and Technical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational knowledge in the specialized field
context.additional_context: Application of a gamification tool based on smartphones, implementing a personalized reward system to sustain learner motivation.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize core terminology from specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) with over 80% accuracy through gamification elements.
Learners can complete over 90% of tasks optimized for their personal learning styles through an adaptive gamification system.
Learners can maintain attendance rates of over 95% for a four-week course through a dynamic reward system (points/badges/leaderboards).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
